product_name: OLAPLEXNo.9 Bond Protector Heat Protection & Frizz Reduction Nourishing Hair Serum
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganOLAPLEX No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum is a weightless, antioxidant-rich, silicone-free hair serum to protect from tangles, breakage, static, and future damage by nourishing hair, blocking pollutants, neutralizing free radicals, and providing heat protection up to 450°F. All hair types.
details: DetailsBenefitsImproves style retention and reduces tangles and staticProtects color and provides satin shine450ºF/232ºC heat protection and 48-hour pollution protectionKey IngredientsPVP A flexible polymer that helps maintain hair style and shape.Cetrimonium Chloride Conditions, smoothes, softens, and has an anti-static effect.Research ResultsInstantly shields hair from pollution48 Hr OLAPLEX Pollution Protection Index™Item 2596420How To UseApply a small amount to clean, damp hair working upward from ends to roots. Use more as needed for longer, thicker hair.Style as usual. Air-dry for a soft texture. Blow-dry for a smooth finish. Diffuse for defined waves or curls.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Betaine, Quaternium-22, Sodium Hyaluronate, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, PVP, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Pelvetia Canaliculata Extract, Xylitylglucoside, Polyquaternium-44, Anhydroxylitol, Maltitol, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xylitol, Sorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citral, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to clean, damp hair working upward from ends to roots. Use more as needed for longer, thicker hair.Style as usual. Air-dry for a soft texture. Blow-dry for a smooth finish. Diffuse for defined waves or curls.

reviews.headline: on a whim
reviews.comments: I grabbed this off the shelf on a whim. I didn't really go into the store for it. I love it! It encourages the waves in my hair, helps with frizz, and makes my hair look SO healthy

reviews.headline: Great styling product
reviews.comments: This is a great product for styling and getting rid of frizz. My hair is very thick and I use a small amount on the mid section down.

reviews.headline: My hair looks amazing
reviews.comments: I love how a small amount of product brings out my curls and keeps them looking amazing all day. I apply to damp hair and let air dry and I am in love with how good my hair looks

reviews.headline: Great Product!
reviews.comments: I received a sample of this in an Allure Beauty Box, and I love it! I just bought the full size at Ulta. It really helped my fine hair and protects it from the blow dryer and flat iron.

reviews.headline: My go-to heat protectant!
reviews.comments: I have repurchased this several times, I started using a few years ago and it protects my hair from heat while also providing moisture. I noticed that when I didn't use this product or switched to another product, my hair felt dry and didn't last as long before washing. Love!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: One of the best things I have put in my hair.

reviews.headline: I really do notice a difference
reviews.comments: Let's start by letting you know that I have very gray, color treated, thick, course hair. I had been using IGK Good Behavior routine (I still use) but the Color WOW is my number 1 go to now. I start with the Olaplex #9 serum on my ends. I use the Color WOW Pop and Lock and spray down with the Dream Coat. I let it air dry about 80% before blow drying and flat ironing. I spray sections with the Color Wow Mistical Shine Spray. This is the first time I'm able to get all day results even in winter (California) My hair looks and feels soft and silkie all day. I love it! I actually notice a difference when I change up the routine and omit an item.

reviews.headline: I found what works for me!!
reviews.comments: I've been experimenting with products lately and can confidently say this is a must in my wash and straightening routine. I apply while hair is wet and blow dry after. My hair is so silky after I style it. I'll use on wash n go's to see how it works

reviews.headline: Totally damaged my hair
reviews.comments: Im sending this message to express my total disappointment in this product. I've been using # 3,4, 5, 8  and 9  for over 6mo now. At first I noticed my hair soft and shinny. Now my hair is super dry looking and has way more breakage than before. used as directed but total fail. I started with the trying kit and then bought big bottles. Way too expensive for the poor quality and horrible results.

reviews.headline: A go to for me
reviews.comments: Love this product. I have consistently used it for a couple years now and highly recommend it.

reviews.headline: My holy grail for fine curly hair
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for at least 2 years and its honestly been the biggest game changer for my hair! I have fine curly hair that gets weighted down by almost everything. I have never had that be a problem with this and my hair does not get greasy/ oil after application. When I use it, I split my hair in half and I use two pumps per section and scrunch. Then I diffuse and it gives me amazing curls and volume. I used to use it when I would airdry my hair and it would airdry in half the time and it left a cast that I would scrunch out for frizz free curls (I changed to diffusing because I wanted volume). I honestly don't put anything in my hair except this and I have finally achived the curls I have had put in so much trial and error for. Give this a try especially if you have fine curly hair!

reviews.comments: no static protection

reviews.headline: The Only Olaplex Product that Works (for MY Hair)
reviews.comments: I haven't had the best luck with Olaplex. Even though I have dyed platinum hair, I don't think my hair type or texture is the target audience for Olaplex products because they usually make it brittle. However, I LOVE No. 9. I notice a considerable difference between using it and not. I just add the serum to my ends after towel drying my hair and it doesn't matter whether I heat-style or air dry because my hair turns out a lot softer when using. It is the one Olaplex product I recommend to those who are looking into the brand.

reviews.headline: Would never buy from this brand again
reviews.comments: I used it for the first time, burned my hair after and it left burn marks on my straightener

reviews.headline: Did nothing
reviews.comments: This did nothing at all after trying it various ways and with and without other products. My stylist told me it's a base to prep your hair for other styling products but I saw no difference with or without with various products. The hunt continues….

reviews.headline: Great for smoothing and protecting hair.
reviews.comments: I use this and the #6 together and it's perfection on my thick, wavy hair.  I always have a good hair day when I use this duo!

faceoff_positive.comments: My stylist recently recommended I try the Olaplex Shampoo, Conditioner, and Serum because my usually strong hair started to react negatively to the highlighting and color treatments that we do. My hair is strong and has held up well. But when it suddenly started to rebel, I didn't like how frizzed out my hair looked, even after my stylist had treated and applied a deep conditioner. My stylist said: "You need to use a better set of products between hair appointments".   My stylist has never tried to "sell me" on certain products. But when my hair needed to be repaired, he recommended Olaplex. He said that Olaplex had consistently impressed him over the years. He told me a bit about the history of the product line, who created it, who used it, etc. I was intrigued. I live in NYC so a good haircut and coloring job is expensive. I figured that since I'm already paying a pretty penny for the right stylist, why not invest a bit in a solid product line to treat my damaged hair. My stylist liked other products in the Olaplex line, but since I was looking to keep costs down, I went with the basics and tried Olaplex shampoo, conditioner, and serum on his recommendation.   WOW! My hair had looked damaged - broken and fried. It also needed moisture. In just one use, I noticed a very significant improvement. After just two uses, my hair looked healed! It was like new.   Also, I'm usually pretty adept at styling my hair. But in the last few years, because I have a lot of thick hair, I had trouble getting my short, stacked, bob to look totally smooth with my blow drying. The cut and color were amazing. But I could never get the blow out really smooth on my own. My arm would get tired while blow-drying. I also don't have a super-powerful blow drier either. I tried all sorts of smoothing products, including Aragon oil. But my hair always looked a bit frizzed. Not when my stylist dried it. Only when I did.   Then, I tried Olaplex. I couldn't believe the results from the serum. I'm sure it was the combo of all three products that helped. But the serum is amazing. I was finally able to get a smooth blow out. It's not as good as my stylist's, but it's significantly better than it was. My stylist noticed it immediately.   Thank you, Olaplex, for developing such a great line. I've already recommended you to others. Keep up the solid, consistent effort! Don't change a thing....  From, A "Happy" New Yorker
faceoff_positive.headline: My stylist recently recom

faceoff_negative.comments: I love everything olaplex, this is the first product I found to be underwhelming. I use their bonding oil, and styling cream, their benefits are clear to me. The oil gives shine, detangles, heat protection. The style cream provides heat protection and holds style from curl iron. This hair serum did not seem to do anything different for my hair. No extra shine, and not sure about heat protection. I used a few times, and every time I didn't notice it doing anything. My hair did not feel or seem nourished or shiny. Maybe it's good for people who are exposed to more elements of pollution and things like that. The texture is very slimy, which I found a little unsettling LOL. Either way, maybe this is good for people who need protection from environmental factors. I trust olaplex as a brand, so I have to think this is just not for me
faceoff_negative.headline: Just okay
